Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan will play their eighth match of the 2023 World Cup against New Zealand at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru on Saturday, 4 November.
New Zealand currently sit in third place in the table but have lost two consecutive matches to India and Australia.
The Kiwis play South Africa on Wednesday before the Pakistan game.
Pakistan put up an excellent fight against South Africa and performed superbly against Bangladesh to keep their top four hopes alive.
New Zealand will start the game as firm favourites, but recent form could make this a tighter contest than the World Cup table suggests.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan and New Zealand have faced off on 115 occasions in ODIs, with Pakistan winning 60 of those matches.
The match will begin at 10:30am IST on 4 November 2023.
